FuncDef:
The default med command configures a MED for BGP routes.
The undo default med command restores the default value. The default med command configures a MED for BGP routes. The undo default med command restores the default value. By default, the MED value of an imported route equals the cost of the imported route; the MED value carried in a route learned.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the MED for BGP routes.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo:
The default med command is valid only for the routes imported using the import-route command and BGP summary routes on the local device.
The default med command configures a default MED value for the routes to be advertised to common EBGP peers or confederation EBGP peers so that the optimal route can be selected based on the MED for the traffic that enters an AS. With other conditions being the same, the route with the smallest MED value is selected as the optimal route.
